moviesData.title: The Shawshank Redemption
moviesData.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
moviesData.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

moviesData.title: The Godfather
moviesData.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
moviesData.actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

moviesData.title: The Dark Knight
moviesData.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
moviesData.actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

moviesData.title: 12 Angry Men
moviesData.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
moviesData.actors: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam

moviesData.title: Schindler's List
moviesData.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
moviesData.actors: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley

moviesData.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
moviesData.actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen

moviesData.title: Pulp Fiction
moviesData.description: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a diner owner intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
moviesData.actors: John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman

moviesData.title: The Princess Bride
moviesData.description: The epic tale of Westley, a farmhand who must rescue his princess true love from the evil Prince Humperdinck.
moviesData.actors: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright

moviesData.title: Spirited Away
moviesData.description: Chihiro Ogino, a sullen ten-year-old girl, wanders into a world of spirits. After her parents are turned into pigs by the witch Yubaba, Chihiro takes a job working in Yubaba's bathhouse to find a way to free herself and her parents and return to the human world.
moviesData.actors: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Chieko Baisho

moviesData.title: Inception
moviesData.description: Dom Cobb is a professional thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology. He is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., which is impossible to do. If he succeeds, it will be his ultimate score, but also allow him to finally return home to his kids whom he longs to see.
moviesData.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
